plot: A regular kid named Jordan from Arkansas gets a recent transplant to South Los Angeles. He's trying to regulate a crew of unpredictable friends and at the same time juggling working in the family diner with his grandfather and school. Jordan and his friends always try to keep it cool, and at the same time live life their way.   Written by  Kayla

title: JUST JORDAN
